arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lille 3-1 Brest: Jonathan David records 100th goal in cruising victory
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 14, 06/12/2024 Jonathan David recorded his 100th and 101st goal for Lille OSC as Les Dogues cruised past Stade Brestois (3-1) to leapfrog AS Monaco (at least…

arts.ttl: Jonathan David cost 'revealed' as Barcelona, Man United 'circle for prolific striker'
arts.sum: Barcelona and Manchester United reportedly learn that a deal for Lille forward Jonathan David will cost in the region of £66.3m.

arts.ttl: Brest predicted XI v Lille: Romain Faivre and Kenny Lala to miss out
arts.sum: Eric Roy must contend with some major injury absences as his Stade Brestois side prepare to take on Lille OSC on Friday night. Brest are notably without key man Pierre…

arts.ttl: Lille predicted XI v Brest: Mitchel Bakker and Angel Gomes out, Edon Zhegrova benched?
arts.sum: Lille OSC must contend with plenty of absentees as they prepare to face Stade Brestois on Friday evening. Mitchel Bakker is out of the encounter through suspension, meaning that Aïssa…

arts.ttl: Lille's unbeaten run is down to coach Genesio's astute blend of youth and experience
arts.sum: Midfielder Ngal’ayel Mukau scored both goals in a 2-1 win at Bologna in the Champions League last week, with fleet-footed 19-year-old right winger Matias Fernandez-Pardo setting up the second. That’s how long it has been since Lille lost a match and coach Bruno Genesio is winning admirers along the way, both for his tactical acumen in Europe and for bringing through more young players who have caught the eye.

arts.ttl: Tanguy Coulibaly receives 2-game suspension for kicking ball at Lille coach Bruno Génésio
arts.sum: The Ligue de Football Professionnel (LFP) disciplinary committee has handed Montpellier HSC winger Tanguy Coulibaly (21) a two-game suspension for his actions in the club’s 2-2 draw with Lille OSC. …

arts.ttl: Brest’s Kenny Lala set to miss Lille visit and Champions League clash with PSV
arts.sum: According to a report by L’Équipe, Stade Brestois will likely be without right-back Kenny Lala (33) for at least two of their upcoming fixtures. The French outlet writes that Lala…
